definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: A big sticking point will be Merkel's insistence on renegotiating the Lisbon treaty.
sentences.chinese: 目前的關鍵在於默克爾堅持要修訂里斯本條約。

sentences.english: Arrive at Lisbon's Portela Airport where you'll be transferred to the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 抵達里斯本的波爾特拉機場，專車接送至酒店。

sentences.english: After dwelling in Rio for ten years, she moved to Lisbon.
sentences.chinese: 她在里約居住了10年之後遷居到里斯本去了。

sentences.english: The seven winners will be announced July 7 in Lisbon, Portugal.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝的七大景點將於7月7日在葡萄牙里斯本宣佈。

sentences.english: It is the oldest city in Western Europe – predating London, Rome, and the like.
sentences.chinese: 早於倫敦羅馬等城市，里斯本是西歐最古老的的城市。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Brisbane on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至布里斯本機票。

sentences.english: LLH now sits in the most historic area of Lisbon.
sentences.chinese: LLH現在坐落在里斯本的歷史最悠久的地區。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Brisbane on QF.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲航空公司來回香港至布里斯本機票。

sentences.english: Continue to Vila Vicosa to visit the Ducal palace and return to Lisbon.
sentences.chinese: 維拉維索薩繼續參觀公爵宮，回到里斯本。

sentences.english: The Lisbon Treaty is intended to speed up decision-making in the E.
sentences.chinese: 里斯本條約旨在加快歐盟的決策進程。

sentences.english: The parliament cannot change the Lisbon treaty, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，議會不能修改《里斯本條約》。

sentences.english: A Portugal tour almost always takes visitors through Lisbon and the Alfama district.
sentences.chinese: 阿葡萄牙旅遊幾乎總是通過里斯本和阿法瑪區的遊客。

sentences.english: The Lisbon government has staunchly rejected that view.
sentences.chinese: 里斯本政府堅決拒絕接受這個看法。

sentences.english: MICHAEL A. NIELSEN is an associate professor in the department of physics at the University of Queensland in Brisbane , Australia.
sentences.chinese: 尼爾森是澳洲布里斯本昆士蘭大學物理系的副教授。

sentences.english: Then we hired a car and drove over to Lisbon in Portugal.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們僱了輛車去了葡萄牙的里斯本。

sentences.english: NATO summit scheduled two-day today and tomorrow in the Portuguese capital Lisbon.
sentences.chinese: 北約峯會定於今明兩日在葡萄牙首都里斯本舉行。

definition: variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid
Zagreb, capital of Croatia 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4]
Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
